Books.title: Dizajn na co dzień
Books.impressions_pl: Podręcznik dobrego projektowania nasycony konkretną wiedzą. Bardzo solidna dawka przydatnych informacji dla dizajnerów
Books.impressions_en: A classic book on design written by a protagonist of usability and human center design. Very inquisitive and passionate lecture. A deep dive into human cognition and psychology. A book not only about the way we perceive design, but also how good design should be created.

Books.title: Bystre Zwierzę
Books.impressions_en: A scientist and primatologist takes off for a journey through different species, showing off how wise they can be. An open mind of the author gives us insights in the world that is far richer that we usually think.

Books.title: Miasto Archipelag. Polska mniejszych miast.
Books.impressions_en: A reportage that guides through Polish cities, once capitals of ex-voivodeship. Most of them has economically declined and greyed out. Springer enrolls dozens of small stories with his elegant and light style. All of them create archipelago, a big picture of those small islands scattered across the map of Poland.

Books.title: Kolor. Kurs dla artystów i projektantów.
Books.impressions_en: A classic book that brings all the current knowledge about color and applies it into practical design implementation.

Books.title: Sapiens. Od zwierząt do bogów.
Books.impressions_en: Facinating journey throughout history of homo sapiens.

Books.title: Wędrujący świat
Books.impressions_pl: Świetna popularnonaukowa książka dla tych, którzy potrzebują dobrego przewodnika w skomplikowanym świecie współczesnej gospodarki. Wieloaspektowe podejście, nie tylko z perspektywy ekonomicznej.
Books.impressions_en: Great book that puts in a simple language a hectic world of economy, politics and sociology. Written by economist, but not only for exonomist. After the lecture, a reader has an overview on complex processess that takes place in modern world.

Books.title: Daleko
Books.impressions_pl: Opowieść o dalekim krańcu świata, kiedyś nietkniętym kulturą współczesnej cywilizacji, jednak obecnie stopniowo coraz bardziej przez nią pochłanianym
Books.impressions_en: The sotry about the forgotten world that only few decades ago was completely untouched by western civilisation. Himalayan peaks ocovered with snow an ancient culture intertwined with cheap chinese TV's where Indian bolywood films now teach the people what the modern human should be like

Books.title: Duchowe życie zwierząt
Books.impressions_pl: Anegdotyczna książka, nieco mniej fascynująca od "Sekretnego życia drzew" tego samego autora, ale wciąż ciekawa i przyjemna lektura
Books.impressions_en: Lots of anecdotes about animal intelligence. Amongst many others we'll meet here a lying cock, smart bees and socially supportive horses.

Books.title: Zapisany w kręgach
Books.impressions_pl: Wspinaczkowe życie Marka Raganowicza i podróż przez kilkadziesiąt lat polskiego wspinania - Tatry, Alpy, Himalaje.
Books.impressions_en: A climbing life of Marek Raganowicz - a story of a man, but also a story of a climbing communicty in Poland, a story of Poland itself, from the 70's till today. Great read.

Books.title: Robert Doisneau
Books.impressions_pl: Doisneau potrafi zaczarować wieczór. Przeglądanie jego fotografii to wejście w równoległy świat, w którym emocje, mimo upływu czasu, są wciąż żywe
Books.impressions_en: True artist that depicts unique moments in a unique way. Also a warmhearted person gifted with a great sensitivity that results in emotional on black & white photography.

Books.title: Dokąd zmierza świat
Books.impressions_pl: Synteza, która pozwala się zorientować w skomplikowanej codzienności. Po przeczytaniu tej książki poczułem, że nieco lepiej rozumiem historyczny moment, w którym jestem. To co się na niego złożyło, i co z niego może wyniknąć dla przyszłości.
Books.impressions_en: A synthesis of modern times and a very brave try to predict the paths the world could go in the future. Very rich in details, scientific and reliable.

Books.title: Chiński maharadża
Books.impressions_en: Extraordinary book writte in great style. A story of free soloing super-hard sport climbing route by the author, as well as many other things happenning in Wojtek's life at that time.

Books.title: Genesis
Books.impressions_en: A concept of depicting the most wild and untouched places on earth came to Salgado after decades he committed to photographing wars, poverty and inequaity across the world. It took him several years to complete and helped to recover from traumas.

Books.title: Baron drzewołaz
Books.topic: Freedom of an individual, Reneissance Italy
Books.impressions_pl: Opowieść wyrażająca niezwykłą potrzebę wolności i ukazująca nietuzinnkową wyobraźnię autora
Books.impressions_en: A perfect novel that has everything I look for in a literature. It is wise, amusing, unconventional and written with unprecedented style. Author is a Italian writter, a Nobel Prize winner.

Books.title: W Kasprowym mateczniku. Opowieść przyrodnicza.
Books.impressions_pl: Bajka dla trochę starszych dzieci. Poznajemy tutaj tatrzańskie zwierzęta, ich codzienne myśli i życie.
Books.impressions_en: A tale for somewhat older kids. An insight into a wilderness and Tatra animals that live in this severe yet extraordinarily beautiful place.

Books.title: Sekretne życie drzew
Books.impressions_pl: Opowieść o świecie roślin i ich niezwykłych zdolnościach
Books.impressions_en: Lots of anecdotes about intelligence hidden in the silent creatures that human probably tends to underestimate.

Books.title: Milczący Lama
Books.impressions_pl: Reportaż z odległej krainy. Co ma ze sobą wspólnego Buriacja, buddyzm, nieśmiertelność i polityka wielkiego mocarstwa?
Books.impressions_en: The main plot, a body of monk that for some reason denied to decompose, is a background of this story. Though seems to be the most important in the book, in fact it is a story of a culture, society and politics in a distant country of Buryatia.

Books.title: Góry we mnie. Wspinaczka na krawędzi.
Books.impressions_en: A story of Alex Huber and his incredible achievements. His extraordinary motivation lead him to become one of the best and most versatile climbers in the world.
